mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sessions (id, anon_id, title, channel, user_id, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{id}, #{anonId}, #{title}, #{channel}, #{userId}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT id, anon_id, title, channel, message_count, last_message_at, created_at, updated_at, user_id FROM sessions ORDER BY last_message_at DESC, created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit}
